scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: The collection includes press releases, newsletters, flyers and memoranda. The collection also contains flyers, leaflets and outreach collected from the National Lawyers Guild and other organizations on the left interested in law reform. The documents date from 1946 to 1970. PLEASE DIRECT FURTHER INQUIRIES TO: peter.filardo@nyu.edu

bioghist.head: Historical/Biographical Note
bioghist.p: The New York Council to Abolish HUAC circulated literature and staged rallies and protests to try to abolish the United States Congress's House Committee on Un-American Activities.
